entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CVE-2023-29331 - dotnet-watch depends on out of date System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs #40974
  • Project restore fails for .NET MAUI Hybrid App on .NET 8 - Workload dependency issue #40978
  • 🐞 NullReferenceException in Maui UnitTests #40955

Closed

  • .NET Core SDK 2.2.2nn and 2.1.6nn do not work with Visual Studio 2017 #3124
    Discussion
  • .NET SDK Debian 11, Alpine 3.14 and Ubuntu 20.04 has vulnerabilities in ACR Qualys Scan #22056
  • Unaddressed CVEs detected in SDK Images #33952
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #40985
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Refactor pipelines and add Installer jobs #40983
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #40977
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #40976
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #40975
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Do not leak a TextReader in BuildFPMToolPreReqs.cs #40972
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.302 #40948
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.107 #40947
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.424 #40946
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.132 #40945
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.4xx #40910
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.3xx #40909
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #40908
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Fedora and Ubuntu CI legs to latest #40933
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.206 #40942
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.317 #40940
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.120 #40939
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.410 #40941
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Return framework toolset dependency #40919
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #40950
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Fix Alpine Target RID #40843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • Backport PR to use latest MSBuild on core #40883
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #40932
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
